on-arrival.name: Cambodia
on-arrival.note: 30 days. Visa is also obtainable online.

on-arrival.name: Senegal
on-arrival.note: 3 months. Must hold an invitation letter. Visa available online.

on-arrival.name: Somalia
on-arrival.note: 30 days, provided an invitation letter issued by the sponsor has been submitted to the Airport Immigration Department at least 2 days before arrival.

on-arrival.name: Tajikistan
on-arrival.note: 45 days. Visa also available online. E-visa holders can enter through all border points.
